con:testCase.con:description: Test if you can transfer certain amount between your Accounts

con:testCase.con:description: Test if you can succesfully transfer "0" of currency between your Accounts

con:testCase.con:description: Fill currency wrongly (not text but decimal) Send Payment from Revolut Account to Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_028_Create Payment Rev -> Rev_Missing currency
con:testCase.con:description: Fill no currency Send Payment from Revolut Account to Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_029_Create Payment Rev -> Rev_Insufficient amount
con:testCase.con:description:
Send Payment from Revolut Account to Revolut Account without sufficient amount
Send Payment from Revolut to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_030_Create Payment Rev -> Rev_Request_id too long
con:testCase.con:description:
Send payment with request_id which lenght is more than 40 characters
Send Payment from Revolut Account to Revolut Account.
Send Payment from Revolut to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_031_Create Payment Rev -> Rev_Different currencies
con:testCase.con:description: Send Payment from one Revolut Account with currency (EUR/USD/AUD/GBP) to Revolut Account with a different currency

con:testCase.name: TC_032_Create Payment Rev -> Rev_Different currencies_Amount is 0
con:testCase.con:description: Send Payment from one Revolut Account with 0 currency (EUR/USD/AUD/GBP) to Revolut Account with a different currency

con:testCase.name: TC_033_Create Payment Rev -> Non-Rev
con:testCase.con:description: Send Payment from from Revolut Account to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_034_Create Payment Rev -> Non-Rev_Different currencies
con:testCase.con:description:
Create payment in different currencies (between acounts). (I.e. UER-GBP)
Send Payment from from Revolut Account to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_035_Create Payment Rev -> Non-Rev_Insufficient amount
con:testCase.con:description:
Create pyment with NOT sufficient amount Send Payment from Revolut Account to Revolut Account.
Send Payment from Revolut to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_036_Create Payment Rev -> Non-Rev_Missing account ID
con:testCase.con:description: Fill no account_id Send Payment from from Revolut Account to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_037_Create Payment Rev -> Non-Rev_Missing counterparty_id
con:testCase.con:description: Fill no receiver.counterparty_id Send Payment from from Revolut Account to non-Revolut Account

con:testCase.name: TC_038_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Rev
con:testCase.con:description: Schedule a Payment to Revolut Account to be due within 30 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days

con:testCase.name: TC_039_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Rev_Insufficient amount
con:testCase.con:description: Non sufficient amount Schedule a Payment to Revolut Account to be due within 30 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days.

con:testCase.name: TC_040_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Rev_Past Date
con:testCase.con:description: Fill to ISO date - some date from PAST Schedule a Payment to Revolut Account to be due within 30 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days.

con:testCase.name: TC_041_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Rev_Too far in the future
con:testCase.con:description:
Set date of sheduled payment more then 30 days (ie 40dyas)
Schedule a Payment to Revolut Account to be due within 30 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days

con:testCase.name: TC_042_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Non-Rev
con:testCase.con:description: Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days

con:testCase.name: TC_043_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Non-Rev_Insufficient amount
con:testCase.con:description: Schedule a Payment to Revolut Account to be due within 30 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days

con:testCase.name: TC_044_Create Scheduled Payment Rev -> Non-Rev_29 days
con:testCase.con:description: Schedule a Payment to Revolut Account to be due within 31 days. Schedule a Payment to non-Revolut Account to be due within 30 days

con:testCase.name: TC_061_Cancel Scheduled Payment
con:testCase.con:description: Cancel a scheduled transaction that was initiated

con:testCase.name: TC_062_Get transactions
con:testCase.con:description:
Retrieve historical transactions based on the provided query criteria.
The API will return a maximum of 1000 transactions per request.
In order to ensure compliance with PSD2 SCA regulations, we only allow access to the last 90 days’ transactions. However, you will be able to access older transactions within the first 5 minutes of an account access token being authorised. This means that within the first 5 minutes of a Revolut user authenticating your request, you will be able to request data older than 90 days. After the 5 minute mark, access will be automatically restricted to the last 90 days worth of data.

con:testCase.name: TC_072_Get Exchange Rates
con:testCase.con:description: Test if you can get the currency rate for USD to EUR, GBP to EUR and EUR to AUD

con:testCase.name: TC_073_Get Exchange Rates_Same currency
con:testCase.con:description: Test if you can get the currency rate for USD to USD, GBP to GBP and EUR to EUR

con:testCase.name: TC_074_Exchange currency
con:testCase.con:description: Exchange between 3 different currencies. After each test check with Exchange rates if the exchange rate was the same.

con:testCase.name: TC_075_Exchange currency_Same currency
con:testCase.con:description:
Fill "from.currency" and "to.currency" on same code (EUR-EUR)
Exchange between 3 different currencies. After each test check with Exchange rates if the exchange rate was the same

con:testCase.name: TC_076_Exchange currency_Empty to_account_id
con:testCase.con:description: Dont fill to account_id Exchange between 3 different currencies. After each test check with Exchange rates if the exchange rate was the same

con:testCase.name: TC_077_Exchange currency_Invalid amount
con:testCase.con:description: Fill from.amount wrongly (i.e. 0, -123, text or with special symbols) Exchange between 3 different currencies. After each test check with Exchange rates if the exchange rate was the same.

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_002_Create/Send/Check
con:testCase.con:description: Create a new Revolut counterparty and send certain amount to it. Lastly check the Transaction details if the Payment proceed correctly.

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_003_Get Acc1/ Transfer/ Get Acc2 details
con:testCase.con:description: Get Accounts details and pick one Account then Transfer certain Amount of same currency to another of your Accounts. Lastly get the receiving Account account details to check if the Transfer went correctly.

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_004_Create and Schedule to new Rev Account and Cancel it
con:testCase.con:description: Create new Revolut monetary Account and then Schedule Payment to it from your existing Revolut Account. After that get the Transaction details and check if the Payment is scheduled correctly. Lastly cancel the Payment.

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_005_Create Cross-Currency Revolut Counterparty
con:testCase.con:description: Create new Revolut counterparty and get current Exchange rates. After that post new Cross Currency Exchange Transfer to this newly created Counterparty. Lastly check the Cross-Currency Exchange Transfer details to see if the Payment was correct and exchange rate was exactly the same as from Exchange rates.

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_006_Create draft of 3 different Payments with 3 different currencies to 3 different Accounts
con:testCase.con:description: Create draft of 3 different Payments with 3 different currencies to 3 different Accounts. Get Payment Draft info and delete the Draft

con:restRequest.name: Create Payment Draft (EUR/USD/GBP)
Get Payment Draft

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_007_Create two new Counterparties with different currencies, get exchange rates and send payments to them
con:testCase.con:description: Create two new non-Rev Counterparties with different currencies to each other and Main Account. Send Exchange transfer at least 100 EUR worth of Amount to each of the 2 new non-Rev Counterparties. Get Exchange rates for all the used currencies and lastly get Transfer info of both Transfers.

con:restRequest.name: Create counterparty 1
con:restRequest.con:request: { "company_name": "Ext counter1.", "bank_country": "GB", "currency": "GBP", "account_no": "12345678", "sort_code": "223344", "email": "gbpext1@google.com", "phone": "+447771234455", "address": { "street_line1": "1 Canada Square", "street_line2": "Canary Wharf", "region": "East End", "postcode": "E115AB", "city": "London", "country": "GB" } } EOF

con:restRequest.name: Create counterparty 2
con:restRequest.con:request: { "company_name": "Ext counter2.", "bank_country": "CZ", "currency": "CZK", "iban":"CZ6508000000192000145399", "bic":"UNIYCZPP", "account_no": "12345678", "sort_code": "223344", "email": "czkext@google.com", "phone": "+447771234455", "address": { "street_line1": "1 Canada Square", "street_line2": "Canary Wharf", "region": "East End", "postcode": "E115AB", "city": "London", "country": "DE" } } EOF

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_008_Create Scheduled Payment for Counterparty that will be deleted before its sent
con:testCase.con:description: Create new Revolut Counterparty and Schedule Payment to it. Before Payment is finished, delete created Counterparty. Get Payment details and see if the Payment was canceled.

con:testCase.name: TC_E2E_009_Create two Payments for Revolut counterparty and delete this conterparty, check if you can see payments in history of Payments.
con:testCase.con:description: Create or use Counterparty to receive two or more Payments. Delete this Counterparty and check if you can see details of these Payments.
